description: A spacious 2BHK apartment in the heart of Andheri East, Mumbai. This semi-furnished 1100 sq.ft. property is located just 5 minutes from the Metro Station and near Infinity Mall. It boasts amenities like a lift, balcony, covered parking, and 24/7 security. Ideal for families looking for a comfortable and convenient living space. Ready to move-in and Vastu compliant.
